programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Nap - Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Thinking Squad - Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep529
programme.desc: Paw Patrol: Mighty Pups - When their latest scheme goes awry, Mayor Humdinger and his nephew Harold accidentally divert a meteor towards Adventure Bay. The meteor's golden energy grants the PAW Patrol superpowers! The heroic MIGHTY PUPS are on a roll to super-save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel/Bobbi's Bongos - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would! // Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Roar! - Blaze and Stripes transform into ferociously fast jungle cats to race in the Animal Island Championship! But to win, they’ll have to beat Crusher disguised as a cheating cheetah. Can they claw their way to victory?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep611
programme.desc: A Big Splash! - On the Shimmy-Shimmy Islands, everyone's preparing for Queen Zooli's Dance Party! But each time they practice their songs for the party, they're splashed by a huge wave! Will they find who's causing the waves before the party is cancelled?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The Museum - The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Colors Everywhere with Blue - Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pups Make a Splash / Pups Fall Festival - When Cap’n Turbot’s boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks! // The PAW Patrol must pick all Farmer Yumi’s fruit before an early snowstorm comes! But how can Chase help?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pups Save the Sea Turtles / Pups and the Very Big Baby - Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach! // There’s a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic / I Scream - Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. // When Kai overexerts his Water Power on an ice cream machine, the machine turns into a rampaging Ice-Bot!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Snow Squad to the Rescue! - When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173

programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep26

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep6

programme.desc: Tummy - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tummy' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a furry tummy, a squeaky tummy, some silly tummies and a tickly tummy.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep72

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep36

programme.desc: Kevin The Steamie - When Kevin is left in charge of the steamworks, he decides to use the space to practice his shunting skills - with disasterous results.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep158
programme.desc: Sweet and Sour Squidward / The Googly Artiste - Plankton tries to befriend Squidward in an effort to steal the Krabby Patty formula. // Patrick tries desperately to supply everyone in Bikini Bottom with his highly demanded “rocks-with-googly-eyes,” after an art critic deems him a true artiste.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep159
programme.desc: A SquarePants Family Vacation - When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep207
programme.desc: Mimic Madness - SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep110
programme.desc: My Fair Nobby / Gimme a News Break - When Nobby becomes too civilized for Narlene, SpongeBob and Patrick help him remember his backwoods ways. // Perch and his pal Harvey report the news of Kamp Koral, but they stumble upon evidence of a ridiculous conspiracy!

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Smurfs Show - Gargamel plants a crystal ball to spy on the Smurfs, but they turn the tables on him with a fabricated drama.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Smurfboards / Monkey See, Monkey Do - Vanity and Jokey start riding smurfboards around the village, but Brainy believes they're dangerous. // The Magic Supply Store mixes up Papa Smurf's and Gargamel's delivery orders, leaving Papa Smurf with a monkey!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Bollyweird / The Spied Who Bugged Me - Everyone in town is shimmying to the latest Bollywood dance trend: The Tavish Twist! Raj loves it, but Sammy is not so keen.// When Dada's manuscript goes missing, it's up to Sammy, Raj and Tara to find out 'who dun it?'

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep128
programme.desc: Growth Spout / Stuck in the Wringer - Mr. Krabs tries to find enough food to feed Pearl as she goes through her growth spurt. // After showering, SpongeBob gets stuck in his wringer.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Cactus Sitting / Disaster of Hole 2 - The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester won't let Grumpy Pants' round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Squawk in the Name of Love / Date with Destiny - Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back! // Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Fluff Love - Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Snooze Pods / Sticky Vicky - Jasper becomes trapped in a dream using one of Schwoz's Snooze Pods. It's up to Captain Man & Kid Danger to bring him back. // Henry's field trip to the Museum of Celebrity Garbage is cut short by the arrival of Sticky Vicky.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep101
programme.desc: House Fancy / Krabby Road - When Squidward sees Squilliam on a TV show about fancy homes, Squidward becomes infuriated and tries to outdo him. // When SpongeBob mistakenly thinks that Plankton is starting a band, Plankton decides to use this to his advantage.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep102
programme.desc: Penny Foolish / Nautical Novice - When Mr. Krabs sees SpongeBob pick something up off the street, he begins to obsess over the idea that SpongeBob found a penny - a penny that he should have found first! // SpongeBob's boating school class is going on a field trip.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep103
programme.desc: Spongicus / Suctioncup Symphony - Plankton has demolished the Chum Bucket! In its place, he has built a Roman coliseum. // The Bikini Bottom Symphony is accepting submissions for their composition contest, and Squidward is determined to win.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep104
programme.desc: Not Normal / Gone - When Squidward points out to SpongeBob that he's not normal, SpongeBob makes it his mission to become normal. // SpongeBob wakes up one morning to find that everyone in Bikini Bottom is gone - even Gary!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Dr. Sleep / Davey Boy - In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep. But does it work? // Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: The Road Warrior / My Fair Chipette - Alvin sounds the alarm when he believes Theodore has joined a motorcycle gang of vampires! // When Brittany declines Alvin's help for a talent show, he convinces Jeanette to enter, putting them at odds.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Galloping Ghost / Bluehoof's Treasure - When Ferris believes he is being haunted, it's up to the Corn and Peg to prove that ghosts aren't real. Or are they. // Corn, Peg, and Ferris set sail on a swashbuckling adventure to bring a missing piece of history back to Galloping Grove.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Trot Together / Do Good Hotline - When Clarissa and the Posies break up, Corn and Peg show the group that they're better off working as a team! // Corn and Peg start up a do-good hotline, but become frustrated when they keep getting calls from the same client.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep111
programme.desc: TNT-Midi / Poltergoose - SwaySway and Buhdeuce accidentally deliver Spicy Dynamite Bread to T-Midi, and now they have to fix up their mix up. // The rocket van gets possessed by a Poltergoose, who turns out to be a real pain in the beak.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Dorg Rewinds / Dorg and the Last Supperman - When Dorg misses a school trip the Magicals whip up a potion that will allow him to start his day over. // The final issue of Dorg's favorite comic is almost out! But when the gang hijack the delivery for a sneak peek, they unleash Supperman himself!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Boaracle / Out of the Box - The Boaracle, a boar who claims to predict the future, makes a series of predictions about Miguel that all come true. // When Felicity goes viral doing fun unboxing videos, a jealous Rudy slips Pandora's Box into her scratching post house.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: TuffCon / Pet Parents - Sanjay is star-struck when he meets his favorite movie villain - until he discovers the actor is not so different from his devious onscreen personae. // Sanjay and Craig discover a way to hypnotize Darlene and Vijay.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Book Report of the Dead / Stan-Arctica - Fanboy uses Kyle's magical Book of the Dead for his book report material and accidentally turns his teacher into a zombie. // Fanboy is horrified when his favorite superhero, Man-Arctica, seemingly dies at the hands of a super villain.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Doom and Gloom / Law and Odor - Larry has finally snapped under Snaptrap's ruthless authority and forms his own evil agency, dubbed "G.L.O.O.M."! // Petropolis' worst smelling villain, the Stink Bug, has returned to make life odorous for T.U.F.F.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Rusty's Botafort / Rusty's Bull Dozer - When Rusty, Ruby and Liam build a fort that Botasaur can't fit into, he runs away to make his own fort. // Rusty and Ruby help Mr. Higgins fix his broken bulldozer, only to have it cause mayhem all over town.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Dragon Games - Ogre Doug is hosting a contest for the neighborhood dragons, and Norville is determined to win. But the competition really heats up when Bobgoblin enters, disguised as a dragon!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Legend of the Kuro Kabuto - Leo, worried about Karai, tries to convince the others to rescue her, while a master thief steals Shredder's helmet, and it falls into the Turtles' unsuspecting hands.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep51
programme.desc: Spongebob's House Party Part 1 - Spongebob decides to throw a big party after discovering a "how to throw a party" kit in the grocery store.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Alvin Management - When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Time Capsule - When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Munk Vs Machine - The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete in a dodgeball tournament but no-one expects Theo to be their secret weapon.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Dolores Moody / P.I.R.A.T.E. - Parker tries to cheer up the grouchiest woman on Mt. Middlemost-Dolores Moody. // Parker, Angus, and Russell must save the S.S. Steadfast from being taken by pirates.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Toads and Tiaras / Two Boys and a Baby - After Lola gets sick and can’t compete in her pageant, Lincoln coaches Lana to take her place. // Thinking it’ll be easy, Lincoln and Clyde take on the task of babysitting the youngest Loud, Lily.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Cover Girls / Save the Date - When all 10 of Lincoln’s sisters ask him to cover for them on the same day, Lincoln has his hands full. // Bobby and Lori go on a double date with Lincoln and Bobby’s little sister, Ronnie Anne.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep197
programme.desc: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down - Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep8
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel unpack the week in sport on and off the field including the final countdown to the start of the NRL and AFL seasons, plus Australia's Men's Cricket Tour of India and the Women's T20 World Cup.

programme.title: Going Country Ep2
programme.desc: Sr.1 - Justine Clarke continues her road trip, meeting some of our greatest musicians including Briggs and Troy Cassar-Daley, and discovering how country music captures who we are as a people and a nation. (Final)

programme.title: Art Works Ep35
programme.desc: Sr.2 - This week, a Shakespearean classic gets a musical makeover; we meet painter Kurt Boseke and photographer and costume-maker Gerwyn Davies; and we head to Western Sydney's Mt Druitt for community arts festival FUNPARK.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep11
programme.desc: Sr.2 - Love Your Sister co-founder, Gold Logie winner and passionate cancer crusader, Samuel Johnson, opens up about a life plagued by immeasurable loss and tragedy. (Final)

programme.title: China Tonight Ep1
programme.desc: After China's winter of discontent, zero COVID policy ended and cases skyrocketed. Plus Australia/China relations begin to thaw as Ministers meet but tensions with the US rise after the suspected spy balloon saga. (Return)

programme.title: The World This Week Ep6
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep17
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep2
programme.desc: Foreign Correspondent draws on the ABC's unrivalled network of international correspondents to tell stories and meet people from the furthest corners of the earth.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep17
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep8
programme.desc: Sr.1 - From the palm oil plantations, an episode of going back to the roots for an urban and savvy couple. Chef Julz discovers the importance of pigs in local customs and traditions like bride price, initiation and haus krai.

programme.title: The Australian Wars Ep2
programme.desc: Sr.1 - European immigration doubled in Tasmania, and so, too the death count as colonists encroached on the best land and Tasmanian Aboriginal people resisted their occupation.

programme.title: Lost For Words Ep2
programme.desc: Sr.1 - It's the midway point of the 9-week intensive program as these eight adult learners continue on their literacy journey as they implement new strategies into real life situations.

programme.title: Going Country Ep2
programme.desc: Sr.1 - Justine Clarke continues her road trip, meeting some of our greatest musicians including Briggs and Troy Cassar-Daley, and discovering how country music captures who we are as a people and a nation. (Final)

programme.title: Art Works Ep35
programme.desc: Sr.2 - This week, a Shakespearean classic gets a musical makeover; we meet painter Kurt Boseke and photographer and costume-maker Gerwyn Davies; and we head to Western Sydney's Mt Druitt for community arts festival FUNPARK.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep1
programme.desc: After China's winter of discontent, zero COVID policy ended and cases skyrocketed. Plus Australia/China relations begin to thaw as Ministers meet but tensions with the US rise after the suspected spy balloon saga. (Return)

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep17
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Landline Ep3

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep5
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep18
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: 2022 Gran Premio Michelin de la República Argentina Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Termas de Río Hondo Circuit is located 6km from the city which gives the venue its name, in the Province of Santiago del Estero. It was built in a 150 hectare area and officially inaugurated on May 11, 2008, during the visit of Argentina´s Touring Car Racing championship. In 2012, the reconditioning, enlargement and modernization of the circuit began, with the purpose of turning it into Latin America’s most modern, safe and vibrant circuit.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2250
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Andrade vs. Blanchfield
programme.desc: Prelims - Flyweight phenom Erin Blanchfield continues her march to a title shot on February 18 when she faces off with former 115-pound champion Jessica Andrade in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. Unbeaten in the Octagon and fresh from a first-round finish of Molly McCann, New Jersey’s Blanchfield is seen as perhaps the top prospect in the entire UFC, and now she will face her toughest test to date in Brazil’s Andrade, who has won three bouts in a row on her way to the top of the 125-pound weight class

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Andrade vs. Blanchfield

programme.desc: Prelims - The wide open light heavyweight division will see a new top contender emerge on February 26 when elite finishers Ryan Spann and Nikita Krylov collide in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. programme.desc: Highlights - The Termas de Río Hondo Circuit is located 6km from the city which gives the venue its name, in the Province of Santiago del Estero. It was built in a 150 hectare area and officially inaugurated on May 11, 2008, during the visit of Argentina´s Touring Car Racing championship. In 2012, the reconditioning, enlargement and modernization of the circuit began, with the purpose of turning it into Latin America’s most modern, safe and vibrant circuit.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Andrade vs. Blanchfield
programme.desc: Prelims - Flyweight phenom Erin Blanchfield continues her march to a title shot on February 18 when she faces off with former 115-pound champion Jessica Andrade in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. Unbeaten in the Octagon and fresh from a first-round finish of Molly McCann, New Jersey’s Blanchfield is seen as perhaps the top prospect in the entire UFC, and now she will face her toughest test to date in Brazil’s Andrade, who has won three bouts in a row on her way to the top of the 125-pound weight class
